title: OCE lag
body:
Riot please fix the lag some of us are getting. I checked my internet on different games and I'm getting better ping on american servers...
I have looked at the different server conditions and its says that you are trying to check why some people are lagging.
Please hurry up i only played one game with 80 ping this week.
It's painful to teleport ever second and get rooted and die and get flamed at.
Hurry!
{{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
>Please hurry up i only played one game with 80 ping this week.

Do you mean that you only had one relatively laggless game, or that 80 ping is such a hugely high and absurd ping to have that you felt the need to list it as an example of the terrible lag you're getting?
I'm beginning to notice this is more pronounced during the peak hours of the day.
agreed 7am-3pm best time to play atm
